author: .piersy
content: Hi there, does anyone know anything about why Holesky stopped finalizing about 1hr ago?

author: parithosh
content: A couple of operators were updating and it happened at the same-ish time and it took the participation rate down. It should be done now and finalizing. We also found a few nodes down on our end, we're fixing it now and it should improve the participation rate some more.
